name: rerun
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to show a television programme, film, etc. again: The James Bond movies are always being rerun on television.

[ C ] a programme or film that has already been shown before on television: This week's movies are all reruns.
[ C usually singular ] UK something that happens or is done again: The Party is demanding a rerun of the poll.
